subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The current N.C.A.A. president, Mark Emmert, has faced increasing criticism and scrutiny on a variety of fronts, but part of the problem is that the job has become too large for one person.
snippet: The current N.C.A.A. president, Mark Emmert, has faced increasing criticism and scrutiny on a variety of fronts, but part of the problem is that the job has become too large for one person.
